name: ARLightEstimate
desc: Estimated scene lighting information associated with a captured video frame in an AR session.

items.name: var ambientIntensity: CGFloat
items.desc: The estimated intensity, in lumens, of ambient light throughout the scene.

items.name: var ambientColorTemperature: CGFloat
items.desc: The estimated color temperature, in degrees Kelvin, of ambient light throughout the scene.
